author: Daniel Ionson
title: After Life
summary:
~Dark Age Fantasy shrouded in mystery and horror~

Fear erupts in the nation of Gaescea when Seer Mecas returns heralding a cryptic doom, and Kaemen and his fellow warrior-elites, the Wolfhounds, make ready for war.

But Kaemen discovers that the kingdomâ€™s preparations were for naught when he awakes in a realm far more harrowing than the battlefield, for they have crossed over into the Land of the Dead.

Now Kaemen must fight for the salvation of Gaescea, knowing all the while that he is being hunted by damnation.
about: I live in forest-filled southern Indiana. I publish my medieval Fantasy under Daniel Ionson and my philosophy (etc.) under Daniel Jones .

author.title: Musings on the Craft of Writing
